data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Mogila, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mogila, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Mogila you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Mogila, North Macedonia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Mogila, North Macedonia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Albanian, Macedonian people. Make the Albanian, Macedonian people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we pray that the people of Mogila, North Macedonia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Mogila.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mogila, North Macedonia has a population of 6,800.

We estimate Mogila has 11 people who might know Jesus, 4,203 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,586 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 618 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Mogila to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
